jobs_results.title: Test Analyst (1 year direct contract)
jobs_results.description:
Overview

The Test Analyst is responsible to lead the testing of software/applications to ensure they function accordingly to specifications and clients' requirements to meet the business needs. Conducts testing using preferred organizational practices & established processes contained in the Test Methodology to ensure test objective of the project is met.

Key Roles & Responsibilities

Project Delivery

• Understand and analyze testing requirements to prepare test plan, and test design

• Advise project team on design consideration to facilitate meeting of requirements. Advise business analysts and/or customers on the testing requirements and test techniques

• Prepare and ensure readiness of test bed and test environment to carry out the test execution

• Execute test in accordance to the test design

• Analyze test results and work with respective teams to resolve issues such as defect open and resolution rate, bottlenecks in performance and other defects

• Prepare test report for... submission

• Provide regular test results updates

• Recommend and use automated testing tools where appropriate

• Manage test activities and ensure the planned test activities are completed as scheduled

Self / Team / Organization Development

• Adopt test standards and testing methodology

• Create awareness; conduct training on test techniques, assists in implementation of test standards, consistent methodology, best practices and principles.

• Share knowledge within or other NCS teams

• Self-directed learning & development

The Ideal Candidate Should Have/ Be

• Typically 2 years’ with IT/Testing experience with knowledge of test methodology and various test tools

• Diploma or Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Management of Information Systems or equivalent

• Be certified in the testing area is an advantage

• Experience .Net technologies especially C#.Net

• At least 4 years experience with Workflow

• Experience in Front End (user interface), Data Testing

• Experience of System Integration Testing, Performance and Regression testing

• At least 2 years experience in MSSQL

• Familiar with testing methodologies, tools and techniques

• Possess initiative and disposition with a strong commitment and orientation towards results and high quality standards

• Team player with strong communication and interpersonal skills

• Self-motivator with a positive attitude and with high energy

• Proficient in written and spoken English

• Customer focused

jobs_results.title: IT Senior Business Analyst (Renewable Contract)
jobs_results.description:
The Business Analyst/Senior Business Analyst is the main liaison between the business and IT in translating business needs into system solutions. The candidate is required to conduct research on client’s business needs, processes, requirements and its traceability. Develop and communicate effective system solutions.
The person should possess an analytical mind and is able to see interconnections in system solutions and usability. Also, should adopt a systematic approach in addressing complex issues with good judgement and arrive at effective solutions.
Stakeholder Management:
Manage stakeholder expectations and needs by aligning those with requirements and objectives of the organisation. This involves planning of actions to effectively communicate with, negotiate with and influence stakeholders
Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer-related discipline or equivalent
• Minimum 8 years of IT experience
• Minimum 6 years of IT Business Analysis experience
• Minimum 2 years working... in Agile development projects experience
• Certified Business Analyst (CBA) certification will be an added advantage
• Experience in developing Agile and/or UML requirements artifacts is mandatory
• Preference will be given to candidate with the following skillset
• Liaise with stakeholders to identify business needs
• Review existing business processes to identify opportunities
Stakeholder Management:
Manage stakeholder expectations and needs by aligning those with requirements and objectives of the organisation. This involves planning of actions to effectively communicate with, negotiate with and influence stakeholders

jobs_results.title: Jooble - Senior Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
The Business Analyst/Senior Business Analyst is the main liaison between the business and IT in translating business needs into system solutions. The candidate is required to conduct research on client's business needs, processes, requirements and its traceability. Develop and communicate effective system solutions.
The person should possess an analytical mind and is able to see interconnections in system solutions and usability. Also should adopt a systematic approach in addressing complex issues with good judgement and arrive at effective solutions.
Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in Computer-related discipline or equivalent
• Minimum 8 years of IT experience
• Minimum 6 years of IT Business Analysis experience
• Minimum 2 years working in Agile development projects experience
• Certified Business Analyst (CBA) certification is good to have
• Experience in developing Agile and/or UML requirements artifacts is mandatory
• Preference will be given to candidate with the following... skillset,
• Liaise with stakeholders to identify business needs
• Review existing business processes to identify opportunities
• Prepare business cases defining potential benefits, solutions to increase efficiencies of business processes and associated risks
• Propose alternative solutions to streamline business processes
• Establish requirements for the implementation of changes in the business processes
• Conduct in-depth analysis of the business requirements specification and feasibility studies
• Translate business requirements and user needs into functional specifications
• Collaborate with developers to ensure requirements are incorporated into system design
• Guide the team to gather and document existing system specifications
• Function as the liaison between users and technical staff throughout the solution implementation cycle
• Supervise User Acceptance Testing when needed
• Supervise technical documentation and training materials
• Manage user training to facilitate adoption of new systems features
• Act as a point of contact for users regarding complex queries
• Scope out statement of works setting clear expectations of deliverable and exclusions
• Spearhead initiatives or projects

jobs_results.title: Aldon system Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Accion Labs is a global technology services firm with offering a full range of product life-cycle services in the emerging technology segment. This includes Web 2.0, Open Source, SaaS/Cloud, Mobility, IT Operations Management/ITSM, Big Data and traditional BI/DW.

Through nine global offices and a rapid-response delivery model, Accion offers a range of engagement models such as turn-key projects, extended-teams, shared-IP development, offshore-leveraged engagements and professional staffing (contract, contract-to-hire & direct perm).

Accion Labs is privately-held, venture-funded and has a hands-on management team that believes in execution and outcome.

Job Description

Greeting from AccionLabs...!!!!

Why AccionLabs?

• AccionLabs has been listed in the Top 20 Big Data Service Providers by CIO Review Magazine

• Fastest growing technology services firm in Pittsburgh & APAC regions

• Direct client requirements.

Role: Aldon system Analyst

Job Description

•... Bachelor’s degree in computer science/engineering.

• Hands on experience in ALDON and technically proficient.

• Experience in SilverLake banking system, preference is RBK/GTD.

• Experience in AS400/iSeries database and operation system for at least 5 years.

• Experience in system architecture and design.

• Requires superior analytics and problem-solving skills. Must be attentive to details.

• Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.

Good to have :-

• Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP)/Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS)

• Broad knowledge of hardware, software and programming;

Thanks & Regards

Rajitha Reddy Jagapati|Team Lead

in.linkedin.com/in/rajithaj/;http://www.accionlabs.com

Driving Outcomes Through Actions!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pittsburgh | Atlanta | Santa Clara| Bangalore |Mumbai| Singapore | Malaysia | London | Chicago

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines

jobs_results.title: Analyst
jobs_results.description:
The main responsibility of the Analyst is overseeing the Risk Reports (investment analysis) and Data Management. He/she will also assist in ad-hoc projects, in relation to trade related initiatives and be the back-up for Trading & Quant Analysis.

Job responsibilities:
• Compute Portfolio’s returns and monthly performance attribution analysis
• Complete and deliver Asian and Japanese equity fund factsheets, regular reports (e.g. management reporting materials) and ad hoc reports to respective clients/ prospects
• Data preparation for the investment team (i.e. updating portfolio holdings data, portfolio active weights, macro and markets data etc)
• Prepare quarterly materials for Asian equity UCITS funds’ Board Meeting.
• Update data vendor’s website for Asian equity funds’ performance
• To co-work with Compliance and others for any request of KYC from our clients and counterparties
• To assist investment team for preparing monthly review commentaries and quarterly portfolio review... materials
• To assist investment team for preparing pitchbooks
• Take care of RFPs for Asian equity
• To assist Tokyo team where there are any RFPs or data request related to Japanese equity
• To make Risk reports (investment analysis)
• Learn trading function and serve as primary cover for the trading function
• Assist in execution of trades for portfolio managers
• Liaise with portfolio managers for placements and IPO
• All other ad-hoc matters

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree with relevant working experience
• Experience in asset management data management or similar function with particular focus in the buy-side industry
• Must be a self-starter who is able to work independently and interface with all relevant internal teams and external business partners as needed
• Team player with strong communication, interpersonal and management skills including partnering with front, middle and back office
• CMFAS Certification such as M3 will be advantage
• Strong VBA, Microsoft Excel and Bloomberg skills are required
• Strong planning, problem solving and trouble-shooting skills
• Some trading experience will be preferred

For interested applicants, please apply online or send your resume in WORD format to liz.lum@jac-recruitment.com

We regret to inform applicants that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for your understanding.

JAC Recruitment Pte Ltd • EA License No. 90C3026 • EA Registration No. R1872520 ( Lum Yu Ru

jobs_results.title: Senior Wealth Business IT Analyst and Business Project Manager
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities:
• Provide direction and technical leadership on complex, high-impact projects and in all phases of the development and implementation process, ensuring essential procedures are followed
• Provide evaluative judgment based on analysis of information in complicated and unique situations and contribute to formulation of standards and strategies for own area and other functional areas
• Resolve issues that have impact beyond own area and apply in-depth understanding of concepts and procedures within own area and basic knowledge of other areas
• Work as a team to achieve objectives and negotiate with internal and external parties
• Has the ability to operate with a limited level of direct supervision.
• Can exercise independence of judgement and autonomy.
• Acts as SME to senior stakeholders and /or other team members
• This position will also support Consumer and Off-shore business on Technical Management topic and issue that require interfacing with other Citi... Technology arms
• Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency, as well as effectively supervise the activity of others and create accountability with those who fail to maintain these standards.

Qualifications:
• At least 12 years of experience in technology related role
• Degree in Information Technology, Computer science or other relevant computing discipline
• Candidate with wealth management or insurance products knowledge will be preferred.
• Familiar with project management processes and software development lifecycle
• Demonstrated leadership skills
• Consistently demonstrate clear and concise written and verbal communication
• Proven interpersonal skills with ability to partner and influence across organizational lines
• Proven ability of using complex analytical, interpretive and problem-solving techniques
• Single Point of Contact for any escalation on technology issue
• Engage business product managers and process owners to define go-to digital model and strategy
• Work with Technology Risk and Business CBORC to ensure business and technology risks are addressed
• Managing the execution of digital adoption programs
• Measuring the Return Of Investment of digital adoption initiatives

-------------------------------------------------

Technology

Job Family:

Business Analysis / Client Services

------------------------------------------------------

jobs_results.title: Contract (Senior), Business Analyst, Group Finance
jobs_results.description:
Business Function
Group Finance aims to deliver world-class standards in reporting, financial planning and finance processes. We provide insights and analyses that help the bank make sound business decisions %26ndash; whether in the areas of product development or customer profitability. We also provide capital management, business planning, forecasting, and tax and accounting advisory services.
The bank is also a certified Accredited Training Organisation (ATO) for the Singapore Qualification Programme by the Singapore Accountancy Commission and an Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) Approved Employer.

Responsibilities
• Responsible for the user requirements and documentation of the Expected Credit Loss project
• Participate in User Acceptance Testing of the newly built microservices
• Deliver in time sensitive project environment

Requirements
• Banking & Finance/IT/Math/Accounting background preferred
• Knowledge in Credit RWA or IFRS9 ECL will be an advantage
•... Proficient in SAS and/or Python
• 1 to 5 years of relevant experience in projects in a banking environment
• Ability to work both independently and as a team-player
• Meticulous with a hands-on approach and good analytical skills

Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.Singapore
